content: This link will be valid until

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display a message indicating when a link's validity expires. It will appear in the UI as an expiration date prompt or confirmation message. For translators, it should describe the action of linking a valid time frame for a digital asset."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'سيكون الرابط صالح لغاية' while understandable, is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'This link will be valid until' in Arabic (Saudi Arabia).  A more fluent option might consider phrases expressing expiration or a deadline.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ينتهي صلاحية الرابط في' (Yanتهي salahiyat ar-rabit fi) - 'The link's validity ends on' or 'صلاحية الرابط تنتهي في' (Salahiyat ar-rabit tanتهي fi) - 'The link's validity ends on'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Bu keçid vaxta qədər etibarlı olacaq' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase 'This link will be valid until'. A more natural Azerbaijani phrasing would be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu keçid müddətinə qədər etibarlı olacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation 'Tämä linkki on voimassa' while generally accurate, doesn't directly convey the 'until' aspect of the English phrase 'This link will be valid until'. It translates to 'This link is valid'.

The translation 'Այս հղումը կգործի մինչև' is a literal translation of 'This link will work until'. A more natural and accurate translation for 'This link will be valid until' would be something like 'Այս հղումը կգործենար մինչև' or 'Այս հղումը կպահպանի իր գործողությունը մինչև'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այս հղումը կպահպանի իր գործողությունը մինչև

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'このリンクは次の期間まで有効です：' is a literal translation that while understandable, doesn't flow naturally in Japanese. It's overly formal and sounds slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'このリンクは〇〇日まで利用可能です' (Kono link wa 〇〇 nani made riyō kanō desu) or 'このリンクは〇〇日まで有効です' (Kono link wa 〇〇 nani made yūkō desu).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "이 링크의 유효 기간:" literally translates to "This link's validity period:". While understandable, it lacks the natural flow of "This link will be valid until".  It's a bit too direct and formal for typical user interfaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural translation like "유효 기간은" (Validity period is) or "만료 날짜는" (Expiration date is).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'සබැඳිය වලංගු කාලය:' is a literal translation of 'Link Valid Until:' but lacks the 'This' from the English. It reads more like a label or header rather than a full sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'මෙම සබැඳිය වලංගු වන්නේ:' (This link is valid until:)
